content: sts 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 45 sts 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 24 sts total 217 sts do not fasten_off divide for armholes body note leave stitch markers in place do not remove row 1 chain 2 turn 1 double_crochet in next 24 sts use the next stitch for joining/skip first marked st and all sleeve stitches skip 2nd marked st join with a slip_stitch in the next stitch/the stitch after the 2nd marked st 1 double_crochet in next 67 sts use the next stitch for joining/skip 3rd marked st and all sleeve sts join with a slip_stitch in the next stitch/the stitch after the 4th marked st 1 double_crochet in next 24 sts to the end of row total 115 sts row 2 chain 2 turn decrease twice 1 double_crochet in next 30 sts decrease 1 double_crochet in next 23 sts decrease 1 double_crochet in next 23 sts decrease 1 double_crochet in next 25 sts decrease twice total 108 sts row 3 chain 2 turn decrease twice 1 double_crochet in next 16 sts decrease repeat work direction in the brackets 4 times 1 double_crochet in next 10 sts decrease twice total 99 sts row 4 chain 2 turn decrease twice 1 double_crochet in next 14 sts decrease repeat work direction in the brackets 4 times 1 double_crochet in next 11 sts decrease twice total 90 sts row 5 chain 2 turn decrease twice 1 double_crochet in next 12 sts decrease repeat work direction in the brackets 4 times 1 double_crochet in next 12 sts decrease twice total 81 sts row 6 chain 2 turn decrease twice 1 double_crochet in next 10 sts decrease repeat work direction in the brackets 4 times 1 double_crochet in next 13 sts decrease twice total 72 sts do not fasten_off crochet around the edging/collar with right side of bolero place stitch marker in first stitch made and move stitch marker up as your work progresses round 1 do not turn working up the right front edge chain 1 work 3 single_crochet in end of each next 6 row 2 single_crochet in end of each row to neck corner working across opposite side of foundation chain place 1 single_crochet in each chain across working down the left front edge work 2 single_crochet in end of each row to last 6 row 3 single_crochet in end of last 6 row working bottom edge 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts decrease repeat work direction in the brackets 17 times do not turn or join total of 228 sts round 2 work 1 single_crochet in each st around do not join total of 228 sts round 3 work 1 single_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch in the first single_crochet made total of 228 sts note we are now going to be working from left to right reverse single_crochet instead of from right to left as usual with the regular single_crochet round 4 chain 1 work 1 reverse
